title: How do I switch to the stroke input method?
answer:
If the phone is using TouchPal X，the way you switch to the stroke input methodis as following： 

 On the message editing screen, touch the text field to bring up the onscreen keyboard. Select second software. Touch more and select a desired handwriting mode. 

 ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=111449)![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=111450)![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=111451)
